statements: DELETE FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_type = 'Safety Inspection';
DELETE FROM compliance_and_inspections WHERE inspection_date < '2020-01-01' AND inspection_result = 'Fail';
DELETE FROM compliance_data WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND passed_inspection = FALSE;
DELETE FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_result = 'Failed' AND inspector_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND inspection_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota';
